introduction_id: Speedometer Radar Serbaguna adalah peralatan penegakan hukum generasi ketiga yang dikembangkan dan diluncurkan secara independen oleh Maxvision. Peralatan ini mengadopsi desain lipat multi-layar dan memiliki beragam algoritma cerdas bawaan. Alat ini mendukung berbagai pengumpulan barang bukti ilegal dan banyak digunakan di jalan raya, jalan tol, jalan perkotaan, dan semua jenis jalan, termasuk jalan pedesaan.
description_en: Multi-purpose Radar Speedometer is the third generation law enforcement equipment independently developed and launched by Maxvision. The equipment adopts a multi-screen folding design and has a variety of built-in intelligent algorithms. It supports a variety of illegal evidence collection and is widely used in highways, expressways, urban roads and all roads and all scenes including rural roads.
introduction_en: Multi-purpose Radar Speedometer is the third generation law enforcement equipment independently developed and launched by Maxvision. The equipment adopts a multi-screen folding design and has a variety of built-in intelligent algorithms. It supports a variety of illegal evidence collection and is widely used in highways, expressways, urban roads and all roads and all scenes including rural roads.

parameter_id.label: Skenario Perpanjangan
parameter_id.value: Pos Pemeriksaan Seluler, Statistik Arus Lalu Lintas, Peringatan Dini & Intersepsi

parameter_id.label: Fungsi Khusus
parameter_id.value: Kalibrasi laser internal untuk sudut defleksi radar, dengan perhitungan deviasi otomatis. Manajemen perangkat terpusat melalui platform manajemen.

description_id: Speedometer Radar Serbaguna adalah peralatan penegakan hukum generasi ketiga yang dikembangkan dan diluncurkan secara independen oleh Maxvision. Peralatan ini mengadopsi desain lipat multi-layar dan memiliki beragam algoritma cerdas bawaan. Alat ini mendukung berbagai pengumpulan barang bukti ilegal dan banyak digunakan di jalan raya, jalan tol, jalan perkotaan, dan semua jenis jalan, termasuk jalan pedesaan.

parameter_en.label: Extension Scenarios
parameter_en.value: Mobile checkpoint, Traffic flow statistics, Early warning & interception

parameter_en.label: Special Function
parameter_en.value: Built-in laser calibration for radar deflection angle, with automatic calculation of deviation.Centralized device management via the management platform.
